sys_properties.choices: "AWSProductTermination" (default) Custom change request type that auto-approves termination and terminates the product immediately. "standard" The regular "standard" change request type of ServiceNow. "emergency" The regular "emergency" change request type of ServiceNow. "normal" The regular "normal" change request type of ServiceNow.
sys_properties.description:
This property is deprecated since 1.4.0 and is replaced by x_126749_aws_sc.changeRequest.type.
What is the type of the Change Request that is made when the user requests termination of a product provisioned through AWS Service Catalog.
sys_properties.name: x_126749_aws_sc.termination_change_request_type
